Title: COLIBRI POCKET WATCH  W CASE AND OWNERS GUIDE
Description: Up for auction is a Colibri Pocket Watch-Most likely it works, but it is being sold AS IS. Most likely it just needs a battery and will work fine. Comes with the Owners Guide and Warranty and the gift box too. I took lots of shots and close ups. For the most part the watch is holding its gold color. I do not believe that it is real gold. On the inside cover is MOD. DEP. Do not know what that means but its stamped and in pictures. The crystal looks to be in very good shape. The latch is also in working order. The only foreseeable issue is that it will need a battery if it takes a battery. This is a Buy It Now Auction for $75.00 which also includes that cost of postage and insurance.
